headline.main: New York Today: Global Summit, Local Gridlock

docs.snippet: The Hall of Famer Lawrence Taylor criticized rules intended to increase safety in the N.F.L., but he acknowledged mistakes that embarrassed his family and the Giants....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Hall of Famer Lawrence Taylor criticized rules intended to increase safety in the N.F.L., but he acknowledged mistakes that embarrassed his family and the Giants.
docs.abstract: William C Rhoden Sports of The Times column observes that New York Giants Hall of Famer Lawrence Taylor has criticized NFL's new rules intended to increase safety, but he acknowledges mistakes that embarrassed his family and the Giants.

headline.main: Taylor, Proud of His Hits on the Field, Regrets the Pain He Caused Off It
headline.print_headline: Taylor, Proud of His Hits on the Field, Regrets the Pain He Caused Off It
